Shopify

Shopify Data Science Intern (Remote) 2026

Analyze commerce product metrics and experiments at Shopify in a remote data science internship.

CompanyShopify
RoleData Science Intern
LocationRemote
Duration12-16 weeks
StipendExpected/Indicative: USD 4.5k–6.5k/month
Work Hours40 hours/week
Employment TypeIntern
Experience0-2 years

Eligibility & Skills

  • Students/new grads with statistics, SQL, and Python/R
  • Education: B.S./M.S. in CS/Stats/Math/Economics or related
  • Branches allowed: Computer Science, Information Technology, Mathematics, Statistics
  • Skills: SQL, Python/R, Experimentation, Communication
  • Year of study: 2026/2027 grads
  • Age limit: Per company policy

What you will work on

  • Analyze feature performance and merchant funnels.
  • Design/interpret experiments and causal analyses.
  • Build dashboards and decision-ready insights for product teams.

What makes you a fit

  1. Solid SQL and data wrangling in Python/R.
  2. Statistics/experimentation knowledge.
  3. Clear communication for async teams.

Interview stages

  • Recruiter screen.
  • Technical round (SQL/stats/analytics case).
  • Panel with DS/PM/Eng.
  • Offer with stipend details.

Ready to apply?

Applications close on 15 March 2026.
